ideas.title: Jet Backpack
ideas.details: Eliminate the use of cars.  The future of travel is fully solar powered jet packs
ideas.funds: All funds will be used to build more jetpacks

ideas.title: Help a starving Artist (me)
ideas.funds: All funds will be used to buy food
ideas.rewards: I will mail you a haiku

ideas.title: Build a large tower of cans
ideas.details: We want to replicate the Eiffel Tower with empty soup cans.
ideas.funds: All funds will go to the purchase of super-glue and cans
ideas.rewards: We will mail you a signed phot of the finished product
